oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wayne Morris interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Wayne Morris was 4th Platoon Leader, with the 199th Light Infantry Brigade, serving in-country from October 1967 to September 1968. This interview was conducted May 1, 2020, at the Blount County Public Library by Billy Minser and Ed Caudill.
